https://tmrev.io/movie/171404-Between Friends 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A snapshot of the interwoven relationships between a group of young people in contemporary Trinidad and Tobago who are all connected in some way. The storyline, focused on two generations of contemporary middle-class Trinidadians, gradually exposes the hopes, secrets, lies and betrayals in the lives of the various characters. Between Friends
